name: Bard
desc: An inspiring magician whose power echoes the music of creation
coolFeatures: Magic flows through your arts, be it music, performance, card tricks, painting or any other form of art
Can inspire others through your magic

prompts: What led you to the art you practice?
Why do you perform? Do you want to make the world a happier place? Do you seek secrets? Is your performance a ruse?
